name: 123 Flash Chat Oxwall Chat Module
short_description:
Users integrated: Users of your Oxwall can be fully integrated to chat room.
Single sign-on: No separate login is required.
Profile integrated: Oxwall user profiles can be fully integrated to chat room. New!
Avatar integrated: Oxwall users avatars can be transferred as well.
Multiple skins: Sixteen skins are available to fit in your CMS.
Customize size and interface language to match your CMS.
Free hosted chat available.
Free Video Support for paid users.
30 Days Free Video Support for new text chat buyers. 
16 skins available.
PPM/PPV support for paid users. Make profit by running the chat.
Mobile APP available; Iphone, Ipad and Android devices supported
Video Conference available
Various chat clients: A standard Flash client has full features, and an enhanced HTML 5 chat client has vivid appearance, loads fast and works cross devices on pc, iPhone, iPad and Android devices
summary: It can add a free live chat room to Oxwall in minutes!
